title: Crash bij installeren
content: Als ik direct na installatie van Windows 11 een installatie van Thunderbird doe, crasht de computer: bij openen van Thunderbird verschijnt de mededeling: "Thunderbird is al actief, maar reageert niet. Het oude Thunderbird-proces moet worden afgesloten om een nieuw venster te openen". Zie foto. Sluit ik vervolgens Thunderbird af via Taakbeheer en open Thunderbird opnieuw, dan verschijnt dezelfde mededeling. Vervolgens blijken Windows apps als Microsoft Edge en andere niet meer te werken. Let wel: dit is na een verse Windows 11 installatie. Dit moest ik uitvoeren omdat Windows daarvoor gecrasht was met hetzelfde Thunderbird probleem, vermoedelijk na een automatische update van Thunderbird rond half september 2025. Ik ben nu overgestapt op Outlook, maar ben benieuwd of iemand anders dit probleem ook heeft (gehad).
creator: rik.jos1

title: hyperlinks werken niet
content: Ik werk met Linux Mint 22.1 Xia. Ik krijg dagelijks notificaties van mijn online todo-lijst (Vikunja), met daarin hyperlinks naar de taken die nog openstaan. Daarop klikken heeft geen effect: de url is null, er valt dus niets te kopiëren of door te sturen. Ik heb alle aanwijzingen in het forum gevolgd: Firefox is de default browser en alle voorkeursintellingen staan goed of zijn uitgeschakeld. Probleemoplossingsmodus levert geen ander gedrag van Thunderbird op. Onder Android zijn de links wel clickable: klikken vanuit de dezelfde email start firefox, dus ik vermoed dat het versturende programma (Vikunja) naar behoren werkt. Wat zou ik verder kunnen doen?
creator: gijshvg

title: Send button disappeared
content: Hi, starting this morning I suddenly did not have a SEND button in Thunderbird 143.0 (on an iMac) when I tried answering an e-mail, same for forwarding or wring an e-mail. There was no update that I know of. I tried reinstalling Thunderbird, but this did not help. Several online forums mention the topic, but often from many years ago and therefore older versions. e.g. one video suggested switching on a Toolbar, that no longer exists in this version. As far as I can tell - no changes in any toolbar have an effect on what I see INSIDE an unfinished e-mail. So, I am completely blocked from doing any e-mails until I can figure that out. PLEASE HELP!
creator: jutta3

title: AppUpdatePin policy doesn't do anything
content:
Hi

I tried using the AppUpdatePin policy and can't get it to work. I had never used it before, so I don't know if I missed something, or if there's a specific problem with this version.

I did all my testing with Thunderbird 140.0.1 (ESR): first I change the AppUpdatePin value (HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Mozilla\Thunderbird), then I install Thunderbird, then I launch it and let it check for updates. It always ignores the AppUpdatePin value (tested with : 140.1 / 140.0 / 140.0.1) updates to 140.3!

Any idea?

title: Errore invio messaggio "Policy Violation"
content:
Buongiorno a tutti,

Ho cercato sul web e sui vari forum ma senza giungere a soluzioni del mio problema.

Da un paio di mesi a questa parte ho il seguente errore quando invio mail dal nostro indirizzo aziendale:

Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l'invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx policy violation. Controllare il destinatario del messaggio xxxxxx@xxxx e riprovare

L'indirzzo mail viene gestito da Aruba business, ma solo questo da problemi nella posta in uscita, infatti gli altri funzionano bene.

Grazie mille a chi saprà aiutarmi
creator: info13024

title: Non visualizzo le mail in Thunderbird
content:
Buongiorno, da qualche settimana quando apro Thunderbird non scarica le email (ho 5 account associati a Thunderbird). Riesco a vedere solo alcune delle ultime mail arrivate, non tutte, e quelle più vecchie non compaiono. Inoltre non vedo neanche la posta inviata e tutte le mail che avevo nelle altre cartelle degli account o in quelle da me create. Se vado in modalità risoluzione problemi ricompare tutto, ma se esco da questa modalità le email scompaiono di nuovo. Questo non è un modo corretto di lavorare. Come posso ripristinare la situazione? Devo forse compattare perché magari ho troppe email e il programma non riesce a gestirle? Uso Thunderbird per lavoro e vi sarei grata di un pronto riscontro.

Grazie Giovanna

title: How do I turn off spellcheck?
content:
I now have an intrusive spellcheck (140.3.0esr (64-bit)). My e-mails are littered with underlining and pop-ups.

The "suggestions" are sometimes completely farcical - words correctly spelled but flagged, and some that appear to be subject to grammar checking instead.

I can find no way of turning this off. Surely it should be optional?

I am a native English speaker with several English exam passes. I neither need nor want Thunderbird's "assistance". For the same reason I do not use others' offerings such as Microsoft, Google etc.

title: Thunderbird freezes if I leave window and come back
content:
Hello,

Starting this week, never happened before....

Using Thunderbird 140.3.0esr (32-bit), Windows 10

If I leave Thunderbird to another application (or even sometimes if I change windows in Thunderbird), when I come back to Thunderbird it is often frozen, in "not responding" status.

I can't see any pattern to when it does this, but it is frequent. The only virus protection I am using is Windows Defender.

I have already tried deleting and rebuilding global-messages-db.sqlite I have compacted folders. I have repaired the inbox folder, which is where I typically am when this occurs.

I'm stumped. Any ideas?

Thank you.

Scott
creator: shochberg

title: Printing Thunderbird emails - default number of copies on printer menu is 2
content:
Every time I want to print an email, the default copy number on my printer menu is shown as 2.

I don't know how, when or why this change [from 1 copy to 2 copies] happened.

I wish to 'reset' the default copy number to 1, so I don't accidentally print a second copy and waste ink, etc.

When I want to print documents stored on my PC, the copy number field on the printer menu is blank, allowing me to enter the number of copies I want - so the issue appears to occur only when I print emails.
